Posts.Content: hi, could anyone give me some advice, i have just had my 4th treatment of f.e.c but after 2nd one my arm started hurting and its been getting worse after each treatment. i have mentioned this to the nurses when i have my treatment and i am just told to take ibuprofine and keep a hot water bottle on it as much as possible, this helps a little but as i have two more to go am worried i wont be able to use my arm much as its hard to streatch it now as it is. also last time i had my blood taken was a nightmare thru lack of veins and it took quite a while and a few go's to actually get the blood! anyone had the same problem and if so any advice would be welcome, thanks Jo :-)
